title: TeGC Team 1 ADC & Mid
body:
Hey all.

Truth Gaming Corps is looking for an ADC and Mid laner for 2017 ranked flex queue main team.

Plat/Dia ranks.

Please leave details in comments. 

Summoner Name:
Season 6 rank:
Current flex rank:
Best Champions for Role:
Role:

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Zerkz
Season 6 rank: Platinum 2 (elo did decay from diamond though)
Current flex rank: Platinum 1
Best Champions for Role:  -Illaoi Irelia Trundle Gnar Draven Twitch Jinx Jhin (comfortable with most adcs)
Role: ADC/TOP

Summoner Name: Trick2DG
Season 6 rank: Diamond 5
Current flex rank: Gold 1
Best Champions for Role: Sol Orianna VIktor 
Role: Mid

If you still looking for plebs

Summoner Name: Kilabe
Season 6 rank: Plat 2
Current flex rank: 4/10 unknown
Best Champions for Role: MID: {{champion:238}} /{{champion:112}} /{{champion:13}} /{{champion:103}} /{{champion:61}} /{{champion:117}} ADC:{{champion:236}} /{{champion:81}} / {{champion:51}} /
Role:  Mid/ ADC

If your still looking for people;

Summoner Name: JrBurgerz
Season 6 Rank: Plat 1
Current Flex Rank: Plat 1
Best Champ for Role: Lucian, Vayne, Ezreal. (In Order but can play others)
Role: ADC

My Question is, why are you asking for Plats and Diamonds when you got bronze last season? (source from icon, correct me if your higher rank)
Gold 3 But Idc
Summoner Name: SkullScar (soon to change to a better name)
Season 6 rank: Gold 3
Current flex rank: ADC/MID
Best Champions for Role:Draven,_**JHIN**_,Vayne,Lucian and other adcs that im worse at
Role:Adc/Mid Main
to answer your question, I am the manager.

Zeo
D4
Didnt finish yet
Ahri,viktor,ori,syndra,ryze.
Mid
